DOC.criteria: PATIENT PARTICIPANTS : Have one typical symptom Heart Failure ( i.e . dyspnoea rest minimal exertion ( include orthopnoea , reduce exercise tolerance ) ) AND Have one typical sign Heart Failure ( i.e . elevate jugular venous pressure , pulmonary crepitation , pleural effusion , peripheral oedema ) AND Have one objective measure heart failure : Radiological congestion . Elevated BNP ≥ 400 pg/mL NTproBNP ≥ 1000 pg/mL . Reduced leave ventricular ejection fraction < 40 % ( < 45 % ) previous 12 month . Diastolic dysfunction include tissue Doppler E/e ' ratio > 15 previous 12 month . Pulmonary capillary wedge pressure > 20 mmHg . Diuretic therapy . The additional value diuretic therapy ( IV oral ) debatable , presumably unlikely ( unsafe ) patient genuine HF discharge without diuretic . CLINICIAN PARTICIPANTS : To eligible participate , clinician participant ( i.e . ED physician , family physician monitor nurse ( ) ) must refer patient enrol TEC4Home monitoring service . PATIENT PARTICIPANTS : Physical barrier e.g . unable stand scale . Cognitive impairment ( e.g . MMSE < 20 ) , unless suitable caregiver support . Language ( must able read understand English ) , unless suitable caregiver support . Documented history current active substance misuse ( within 3 month ) . Lack digital connectivity landline phone connection . No regular care provider e.g . GP , least regular walkin clinic . Existing intensive system care : LVAD , transplant , dialysis . Anticipated improvement due revascularization ( PCI/CABG ) valve intervention index hospitalization . Anticipated survival < 90 day . Active palliative care , lessthan level III care , disseminate malignancy .
